name: Top 10 ES6 Features every Web Developer must know
text: This essay will give you a quick introduction to ES6.

comments.text: Cruel…..var { house, mouse} = No type optimization at all

name: Module 2 Assignment Lab: RESTful Blog API
text: The assignment lab for this module is to build a RESTful Blog API.

comments.text: Most often, servers have complex logic and business relations.
Start with an RESTful Express API server by creating a new project.
